item.title: Google Code-In 2019
item.description: I participated in Google Code-In for the first time this winter. Looks like other people are starting to blog about so here’s my blog post so I do not look like a weird antisocial hermit. To be honest, I had a lot of fun participating. In the end, I completed 31 tasks and had done little under 4.5% of all completed Wikimedia tasks.
